sentences.sContent: her brazen admission that she was cheating on him
sentences.sCn: 她恬不知耻地承认自己对他不忠

remMethod.val: braz(=brass黄铜) + en → 像黄铜一样 → 厚脸皮的

trans.tranCn: 黄铜制的, 厚颜无耻的
trans.tranOther: used to describe a person, or the actions of a person, who is not embarrassed about behaving in a wrong or immoral way
